body.p: To his Excelence Thomas Bramblet Govenor of the Commonwealth of Kentucky Your petitioner wold Respectiveley represent to your Excelence that at the present august term of the Whitley circuit courte that the courte rendered a judgement against him for gaming for $20 he states that he is not a gambler but got into a drinkin spree and did bet on a gaim and that the grand jury indited him and the court Rendered Judgement against him as aforestated fo$20 00 he states that he is a pore man and has not the means of to pay the fine and to do Justice to this Remainder of his family Whearefore he prays that your Excelence Remit the fine and set aside the Judgement and hold it for nough and for all proper Relief
Isaac Petrey says he beleaves the statements in the foregoing petition to be true
Sworn to before me by Isaac Petrey this day of Sept 1864
C. S. Creekmore P.. J W C
The under signed say that they beleave it wold be an act of charity to Remit the fine

J. H. Scott
John Smith
W. C. Gilliss
Luke Moore
Jackson Campbell
